resources.string: Choose how to open the assistant from your glasses.
We couldn't pair with your glasses. Try again or review the tips below.
Try these steps to get connected.

string-array.name: scanner_troubleshooting_steps
string-array.item: Make sure your glasses are turned on.
Charge the glasses for at least 10 minutes before pairing.
Enable Bluetooth on your phone and keep it nearby.
Ensure the G1 Hub app has the required permissions.
Hold the glasses power button until the status light pulses.
Restart your glasses and your phone's Bluetooth.
Run a new scan from the G1 Hub app.
